H0.text: The Sharks face off against what gang in Leonard Bernsteins musical West Side Story. Panther

H1.text: The Sharks face off against what gang in Leonard Bernsteins musical West Side Story. Tiger

H3.text: The Sharks face off against what gang in Leonard Bernsteins musical West Side Story. Jet

A4.text: The musical explores the rivalry between the Jets and the Sharks, two teenage street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds.
